meanings.definition: Bright, shining, or lustrous in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The nitid stars sparkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Her nitid smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: The nitid diamond was so bright, it almost blinded me!
meanings.sent4: The nitid lake reflected the sunlight like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The nitid gemstone glowed with a mesmerizing brilliance.

meanings.definition: Neat, trim, or tidy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: She always kept her workspace nitid and organized.
meanings.sent2: His nitid haircut gave him a polished look.
meanings.sent3: The nitid rows of books on the shelf looked like soldiers standing at attention.
meanings.sent4: Her nitid handwriting was like calligraphy on the page.
meanings.sent5: The nitid garden was a testament to her meticulous care and attention to detail.
